name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Full Stack Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess expertise in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **React**, **Next.js**, and **PostgreSQL**, with an emphasis on building scalable and high-performance applications. My proficiency extends to utilizing **Vercel** for seamless deployment and integration of serverless functions while embracing **Tailwind CSS** for creating responsive designs that enhance UI/UX. I have strong experience developing data pipelines and automation solutions that leverage AI technologies, including working with **OpenAI** and **Anthropic** models for image and video generation as well as incorporating agentic AI and context engineering into applications.

I have a solid foundation in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation practices. My hands-on experience includes working with third-party APIs, Git for version control, and leading project teams in startup environments. I am adept at developing efficient machine learning workflows, implementing automation strategies, and ensuring compliance with relevant standards. My ability to integrate innovative technologies with traditional systems has consistently yielded robust and secure applications tailored to client needs.
